result.text:
Recently honored on the #ForbesUnder30 Sports list, @CocoGauff ends 2025 third in the WTA Tour’s rankings, and has collected 11 career singles titles.

Off the court, Gauff has a robust portfolio of sponsors including New Balance, Baker Tilly and recent addition Mercedes-Benz and hauls in an estimated $25 million annually. 

That figure, along with her roughly $8 million in 2025 prize money, lands her at the top of Forbes’ list of the world’s highest-paid female athletes for the second straight year. Read more: https://t.co/iB5A43tNJZ

📸: Guerin Blask for Forbes; Clive Brunskill, Julian Finney via Getty Images
